ygData.subject: Re: Various..
ygData.msgSnippet: Ac is everything for a tank My Agi is 86 I think and my AC is 813 with buffs on. You definatly want to be gettin over 750. Why is Liveside empty? Loot. The
ygData.messageBody:
Ac is everything for a tank
My Agi is 86 I think and my AC is 813 with buffs on.
You definatly want to be gettin over 750.

Why is Liveside empty?
Loot. The only things there for 40 + ppl ate the crusader, priest and the King.
Of those only the King is good for 45 + ppl.
Deadside has Lord, Frenzied, Sent, Magi which all drop more valuable loot

of course, if you're really talented as a puller, you can pull the Mino eldar to
the frenzied or Lord camps. not a super dooper mob but has a nice items for the
wis slingers. It is possible to do, I have the screen shots to prove it 8)


"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:

> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Howdy boys and girls.. Long time no write...
>
> Ok first of all, had a very productive weekend, my guild and I held the Frog
> King room for most of Sunday. Damn that little froggie is tough, once you
> break the spawn up though it gets fairly easy. Picked up the crown on the
> first spawn, but he only spawned one more time in an 8 hour period (another
> crown) so I didn't get the Mith 2h I was hoping on. Oh well there is always
> next weekend. Oh while I was in Guk I finally picked up a Serp Bracer, and
> now I can't decide if I would rather do the Ac route or higher AGI/DEX. Any
> thoughts on this one? (BTW as of now with one Serp Bracer my DEX is 120 and
> AGI is 117 AC is hovering around 700)..
>
> Ok now for the main question, I still have a little ways to go until lvl 50
> and the Life Leech quest, but I wanted to get a start on it early. Do you
> all think it would be better for me to have a lvl 50 guild mate pick up all
> the items needed for the quest (he would go along with me, not do it for me)
> or should I still get all the pieces myself and just wait till 50 to turn
> them in?
>
> Oh one last thing, anybody know why the Live side of Guk doesn't seem to
> have nearly as many people on it as the dead side. Over this weekend Guk was
> hovering around 80 ppl and the dead side was packed (you could literally
> walk around without fear of getting attack), but there was virtually no body
> on the live side (Noble I think was the only mob camped)..
>
> Other than that, enjoy folks...
>
> Thom
>
> > -=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
> -= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
